Class HEC_Creator

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.creators.HEC_Creator
Direct Known Subclasses:
HEC_Archimedes, HEC_Box, HEC_Cone, HEC_ConvexHull, HEC_Cube, HEC_Cylinder, HEC_Dodecahedron, HEC_Dual, HEC_FromBinaryHemeshFile, HEC_FromFacelist, HEC_FromFrame, HEC_FromHemeshFile, HEC_FromPolygons, HEC_FromQuads, HEC_FromSimpleMeshFile, HEC_FromSurface, HEC_FromToxiTriangleMesh, HEC_FromTriangles, HEC_FromVoronoiCells, HEC_Geodesic, HEC_Grid, HEC_Icosahedron, HEC_IsoFunction, HEC_IsoGrid, HEC_IsoSurface, HEC_Johnson, HEC_Octahedron, HEC_Plato, HEC_Polygon, HEC_ShrinkWrap, HEC_Sphere, HEC_SuperDuper, HEC_SweepTube, HEC_Tetrahedron, HEC_Torus, HEC_Tube, HEC_TubeSegment, HEC_VoronoiCell, HEC_VoronoiSphere
public abstract class HEC_Creator
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for mesh creation. Implementation should return a valid HE_Mesh.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
